posts.post_content:
FS:  PayPal only please, gotta pay for an Ebay Purchase

1)  T206 Dunn $32 delivered (see scans, below Chance scans).  Clean front, light crease on back to the right of the word "The."

2)  T206 Chance (batting pose)  MOVED TO EBAY

Formerly in an SGC 10 holder.

The Good:  No creases, no wrinkles, strong corners.

The Bad:  Question mark shaped dot pattern on face and neck.  Looks like it was done with a pin or sharp edge of a paper clip.  Not deep, doesn't go through to the back, but you can feel it if you run your finger over it.  Ironically, there has been speculation over the years that Frank Chance was indeed killed by a gigantic question mark.

The Ugly:  Paper loss on back.

My email:  [url]boboinnes33@gmail.com[/url]
